TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageProcessingHandler extends System.Net.Http.DelegatingHandler
Public MustInherit Class MessageProcessingHandler Inherits DelegatingHandler
public ref class MessageProcessingHandler abstract : System::Net::Http::DelegatingHandler

summary.span: 只对请求和/或响应消息进行一些简要处理的处理程序的基类型。

span.span: A base type for handlers which only do some small processing of request and/or response messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 响应消息的实际创建将委托给内部处理程序。The actual creation of response messages is delegated to an inner handler. 如果处理程序不需要异步操作，则 非常有用，因为对请求和响应消息的操作速度很快。The is useful if the handler doesn't require asynchronous operations, because operations on request and response messages are fast. 最常见的用法是从该类派生，并重写 和 方法。The most common usage is to derive from this class and override the and methods.

span.span: The inner handler which is responsible for processing the HTTP response messages.

span.span: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

summary.span: 处理每个发送到服务器的请求。

span.span: Performs processing on each request sent to the server.

returns.span: 已处理的 HTTP 请求消息。

span.span: The HTTP request message that was processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将 HTTP 请求消息发送到服务器之前，应用程序会重写此方法以实现对该消息的自定义处理。An application would override this method to implement custom processing of the HTTP request message before it is sent to the server.

abstract member ProcessResponse : System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage

param.span: 要处理的 HTTP 响应消息。

span.span: The HTTP response message to process.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 一个取消标记，可供其他对象或线程用来接收取消通知。

span.span: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

summary.span: 处理来自服务器的每个响应。

span.span: Perform processing on each response from the server.

returns.span: 已处理的 HTTP 响应消息。

span.span: The HTTP response message that was processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在从服务器接收到 HTTP 响应消息后，应用程序将重写此方法以实现对该消息的自定义处理。An application would override this method to implement custom processing of the HTTP response message after it is received from the server.

span.span: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

summary.span: 以异步操作的形式将 HTTP 请求发送到内部处理程序，然后再发送到服务器。

span.span: Sends an HTTP request to the inner handler to send to the server as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation does not block. 此 方法的可重写实现将 HTTP 请求转发到内部处理程序，以作为异步操作发送到服务器。This overridable implementation of method forwards the HTTP request to the inner handler to send to the server as an asynchronous operation.
